import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import {connect} from "react-redux" //Imports des composants de l'UI externes import Header from "../headers/header" import HeaderPages from "../headers/headerPages" import Footer from "../footer" //Imports depuis la librairie MaterialUI import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField' import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/styles" import { Button } from '@material-ui/core' const Profile = (props) => { const headerTitle = "Profil" const headerBreadcrumbs = [{value: "Accueil", link:"/"}, {value: "Profil", link:null}] const [user, setUser] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { setUser(props.user.infos) }, []) return(

Informations personnelles

{setLastName(e.target.value)}} error={lastNameError} value={lastName || ""} /> {lastNameErrorText} {setFirstName(e.target.value)}} error={firstNameError} value={firstName || ""}/> {firstNameErrorText} {setPassword(e.target.value) e.target.value ? setPasswordUpdated(true) : setPasswordUpdated(false)}} type="password" defaultValue=""/> Rôle { setNewRole(e.target.value) }}> {roles.map((role) => { return() })}

Contact

{setEmail(e.target.value)}} error={emailError} type="email" value={email || ""}/> {emailErrorText} {setPhone(e.target.value)}} /> {phoneErrorText} {setAddress(e.target.value)}} value={address || ""}/> {setZip(e.target.value)}} value={zip || ""}/> {setCity(e.target.value)}} value={city || ""}/>
) } const mapStateToProps = (store) => { return { } } const mapDispatchToProps = { } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Profile)
